creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: color image of a newspaper clipping with two pictures of trees flanking a picture of a sparce interior with one chair on top of an open book with an image of a highlighted building in a black and white photograph
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Anne Frank’s Tree
